attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned, petition the Government with regard to Asylum seekers and others seeking permanent and/or temporary residence within the country.
All applicants must:-

1. Show some ability to understand and speak English to negotiate for shelter, food and transportation which would assist them to fully integrate into society.


In order to facilitate an understanding of British core values and to assist with assimilation into the society:-

2 (a)  Be made aware of the fact that historically Britain is a Christian country.

(b)	Attend a 3hour seminar explaining core Christian beliefs, while emphasising the fundamental differences between Christianity and the applicant’s religion, thus allowing the applicant information to determine whether or not this is a suitable country to live in.

rejection.details: Please put a clear statement in the main sentence.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
